name: Hell is Other Demons
overview: Hell is Other Demons is the fast-paced bullet hell platformer with big pixels. Jump into the hooves of a demon out to kill a bunch of other demons as you progress through an extensive campaign and dominate wonderfully over-the-top bosses. The game's bold colors and quick action are backed up by a heavy synthwave soundtrack composed by Rémi Gallego, of The Algorithm, and retro sound effects by Magnus Pålsson, composer of the VVVVVV OST.
